column4: We provide hair dryer, bath towel, and small towel. Our hotel does not provide bidet toilets or standalone bidet basins. We do not provide disposable toiletries such as toothbrush, toothpaste, or razor.
column5: 本館提供吹風機、浴巾與小毛巾；未設置免治馬桶或坐浴盆；亦不提供一次性備品，如牙刷、牙膏、刮鬍刀等。

column4: You may take the Taoyuan Airport MRT to Taipei Main Station, transfer to the Blue Line and get off at Ximen Station. It is about a 5-minute walk to Ximen Garden Inn. Alternatively, take an airport bus to Taipei Main Station and transfer by taxi or MRT. Taxi from Taoyuan Airport takes approximately 40–60 minutes depending on traffic. Ride-hailing services such as Uber are also available.
column5: 可搭乘桃園機場捷運至台北車站，轉乘捷運藍線至西門站，步行約5分鐘即可抵達喜園旅館。亦可搭乘機場巴士至台北車站後轉乘計程車或捷運。自桃園機場搭計程車約40–60分鐘（視交通狀況）。亦可使用 Uber 等叫車服務。
